short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add extra functionality to SAP Customer Data Cloud toolkit console

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With SAP Customer Data Cloud toolkit for Google Chrome™, you can  remove repetitive and manual tasks by implementing best practices while improving quality, productivity and well-being. This app connects to SAP Customer Data Cloud and allows Customer Data Cloud consultants to create big and complex site structure based on template structures based on best practices and faster.

Key features of SAP Customer Data Cloud toolkit for Google Chrome™
• Copy Configurations: Drastically improves the duration of copying configuration from 1 site to many and adds functionalities to remove manual and time-consuming tasks.
• Export and Import SMS and E-mail Templates : Removes human error from a time-consuming task, saving time and increasing productivity.
• Site deployer integrated with Copy Configuration: Enables to create complex site structures with custom configurations from other sites that already exists according the best practices.

Note: To use SAP Customer Data Cloud toolkit with your business data, you must be a user of SAP Customer Data Cloud, with mobile services enabled by your IT department. You can try out the app first using sample data.
